text: You only need a small ice cream. No, really. Listen, I know you've been great all week and it's your cheat day, but the small is big and the large is an affront. But you probably do need that whoopie pie, too

Great stop. Clean. Different. Lots of great Amish fresh braked goods.  Nice gift products.  Unique wood products.  Ice cream is too much. Small is a Large in other stores. Produce looks fresh. Watched them make a Sub for another customer. Looked soo gooood!!  Next time. And there will be a next time
I always come here for lunch when in the area. I haven't seen a cleaner place anywhere. The staff is very pleasant and the food is always of high quality. The bulk food snacks are a nice added touch.
